item.title: 【Requests】[REQ VID] - Old K-pop band: T-ARA's old MVs
item.description:
Greetings to everyone and administrators,

I am from T-ARA fandom, which is an old band (the second generation of K-pop industry), desperate looking for T-ARA's golden nostalgic music videos. Mostly their videos are in low quality and alway contained interlacing effects in the videos. (well their musics were debut from 2006 ~ 2009, as I remember, this era has not yet developed high quality musical videos for K-pop idols.)

Therefore, I am really looking forward to seeing the raw videos (in the list below):
  • T-ARA - Lies
  • T-ARA - Bo Peep Bo Peep (Dance version / Cute version)
  • T-ARA - Bo Peep Bo Peep (Sexy version)
  • T-ARA - Yayaya
  • T-ARA - Like The First Time
  • T-ARA - Roly Poly in Copacabana
  • T-ARA - I Go Crazy Because Of You
  • T-ARA - Little Apple

If anyone has those videos, please kindly let me know, huge thanks (*insert polite bowing*)
item.author: Yue2000
